Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears. Values to be used are either urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:bis:order_only:3 or urn:fdc:peppol.eu:poacc:bis:ordering:3

Element.Name: Order identifier
Element.Description: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order issue date
Element.Description: The date on which the transaction instance was issued,in the format aaaa-mm-gg.

Element.Name: Order issue time
Element.Description: The time assigned by the buyer on which the order was issued, in the format hh:mm:ss.

Element.Name: Consignment order indication
Element.Description: Indicates wether the order is a purchase order (code 220) or consignement order (code 227). Default is purchase order.

Element.Name: Document level textual note
Element.Description: Free form text applying to the Order. This element may contain notes or any other similar information that is not contained explicitly in another structure.

Element.Name: Currency
Element.Description: The default currency for the order.

Element.Name: Buyer contact
Element.Description: The element is used for the reference of who ordered the products/services. Example being the name of the person ordering, employee number or a code identifying this person or department/group. Also known as "Your reference", and should also be sent in the corresponding invoice.

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string
Element.Description: It indicates the accounting classification of the Buyer.

Element.Name: Order validity end date
Element.Description: The end date for when the order is valid. The end date for the time period within which the seller must respond. An order should contain the validity end date. Format must be aaaa-mm-gg.

Element.Name: Quotation reference
Element.Description: Reference to quotation which is basis for the order.

Element.Name: Quotation document reference
Element.Description: A requirement to give a unique reference to the quotation that is the base for the order.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: It contains the identifier of the Document previously sent (so-called Tripletta) to which the order is referred and its new status ("Cancelled", “Revised”, “Connected”, “Invoice”).

Element.Name: Originator document reference
Element.Description: It indicates the Tender identification code (CIG) or the exclusion code.

Element.Name: Document identifier - Identificativo del documento
Element.Description: An identifier for the referenced document (e.g the Unique Project Reference (CUP), Despatch Advice ID or the Expenditure Commitment ID).

Element.Name: Document description
Element.Description: It indicates the type of the referenced document (e.g. “CUP”, “DDT”, “IMPEGNO”, “DELIBERA”, “CONVENZIONE”).

Element.Name: Attached document
Element.Description: The attached document embeded as binary object, coded as Base64. The binary object has two supplementary components: a Mime Code, which specifies the Mime type of the attachment and a Filename that is provided by (or on behalf of) the sender of the document

Attribute.Name: Attached document Mime code
Attribute.Description: The mime code of the attached document.

Attribute.Name: Attached document filename
Attribute.Description: The file name of the attached document.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Reference to external document.

Element.Name: External document URI
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the external document is located.

Element.Name: Contract information
Element.Description: Reference to contract

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Positive identification of the reference such as a unique identifier.

Element.Name: Buyer information
Element.Description: It contains the information about the subject who buys or purchases the goods or services (sends the Order).

Element.Name: Buyer party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the buyer party's electronic address.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: :Scheme identifier for the buyer party's electronic address.

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: An identification for the buyer party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Buyer name
Element.Description: Name of buyer The name of the party who orders the listed items.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Postal address of the buyer

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code (in Italy Codice Avviamento Postale - CAP)

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.
Buyer tax information

Element.Name: Buyer TAX identifier
Element.Description: The buyers registered Value Added Tax identifier. To be stated in case reverse charge is to apply to the purchase.
Mandatory element. E.g. "VAT" or "GST"

Element.Name: Buyer legal information - Informazioni legali del Cliente
Element.Description: Informazioni legali del Cliente

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Buyers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact information
Element.Description: Buyer contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Seller information
Element.Description: It contains the information about the subject who sells the goods or services to the buyer (receives the Order).

Element.Name: Seller party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the Seller party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the Seller party's electronic address

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification.

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Name of seller

Element.Name: Seller party trading name
Element.Description: The trading name of the party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Postal address of the Seller

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Seller legal registration identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: Sellers legal registration address city name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Seller contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Originator party - Committente
Element.Description: Information regarding the originator of the order.

Element.Name: Party information
Element.Description: Description of the originator party

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Originator identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: Name of the originator

Element.Name: Originator name
Element.Description: The name of the party.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The originators contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Invoicee party - Intestatario fattura
Element.Description: Information regarding the receiver of the invoice based on the order (Invoicee)

Element.Name: Party information
Element.Description: Description of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee party electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the invoicee party's electronic address.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Identification of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee identifier
Element.Description: An identifer for the invoicee party.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for party identification

Element.Name: Invoicee name
Element.Description: The name of the party who should be invoiced for the ordered items (invoicee).

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: Postal address of the invoicee

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: Tax information of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee TAX identifier
Element.Description: The invoicees registered Value Added Tax identifier
Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST"

Element.Name: Party legal entity
Element.Description: Legal information of the invoicee party

Element.Name: Invoicee's Legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the invoicee party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Element.Name: Company identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a company as registered with the company registration scheme.

Attribute.Name: Buyer legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the buyer legal registration identifier.

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: Associates with the registered address of the party within a Corporate Registration Scheme. The name of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: Invoicee contact information

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Delivery information
Element.Description: Informazioni sulla consegna.

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: An identifer for the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: Delivery location name
Element.Description: A name of the location to where the ordered items should be delivered.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.Format ="YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.Format ="YYYY-MM-DD".

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Identification of the delivery party. The party to whom the goods are delivered.

Element.Name: Delivery party identifier
Element.Description: In this BIS: The identifier of the party that should receive the ordered items

Attribute.Name: Deliver party registration identifier identification scheme identifier - Scheme identifier identificativo beneficiario fornitura
Attribute.Description: Indica lo scheme identifier dell'identificativo del beneficiario fornitura

Element.Name: Delivery party name
Element.Description: In this BIS: The name of the party that should receive the delivery

Element.Name: Contact information
Element.Description: Contact information for the delivery party

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The name of the contact person.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: A phone number for the contact person. If the person has a direct number, this is that number.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The e-mail address for the contact person. If the person has a direct e-mail this is that email.

Element.Name: Final Delivery address
Element.Description: The final address for the delivery.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country.The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Packing label
Element.Description: A text that the buyer requests to be printed on the packing labels.

Element.Name: Delivery terms identifier
Element.Description: Delivery terms identifier, normally Incoterms

Element.Name: Delivery special terms
Element.Description: A description of special conditions relating to the Delivery Terms.

Element.Name: Delivery terms location
Element.Description: The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Payment terms for the order described in text

Element.Name: Allowance and charge information
Element.Description: Allowances and charges for the order

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator
Element.Description: Indicator used to state if the following is an allowance or charge. true = Charge, false = Allowance

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as a code. For allowances a subset of codelist UNCL5189 is to be used, and for charges codelist UNCL7161 applies. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Allowance and charges reason
Element.Description: A textual reason for the allowance or the charge. Can also be its name. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. To state 20%, use value 20.

Element.Name: Allowance and charge amount
Element.Description: The net amount of the allowance or the charge exluding TAX.

Attribute.Name: Currency identifier
Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: TAX category code
Element.Description: The TAX category code that applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: TAX rate
Element.Description: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge. As this element is of data type percentage, please note that no %-sign should be used. To state 25 %, use value 25.00
Tax scheme identifier. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Tax total
Element.Description: Specification of expected tax amount

Element.Name: TAX total amount
Element.Description: The total TAX amount that is "added to the document total w/o TAX". This is the sum of all TAX subcategory amounts. The expected Tax Total in the corresponding invoice.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Anticipated monetary total
Element.Description: stimated total amounts for the order

Element.Name: Sum of line amounts
Element.Description: Sum of line amounts in the document.The total of Line Extension Amounts net of tax and settlement discounts. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total without TAX
Element.Description: The "Sum of line amounts" plus "sum of allowances on document level" plus "sum of charges on document level". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Document total including TAX
Element.Description: The total value including TAX. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of allowances on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all allowances on header level in the document. Allowances on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Sum of charges on document level
Element.Description: Sum of all charge on header level in the document. Charges on line level are included in the line amount and summed up into the "sum of line amounts". Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Prepaid amounts
Element.Description: Any amounts that have been paid a-priory. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Rounding of document total
Element.Description: The amount to be added to the total to round the amount to be paid. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Payable amount
Element.Description: The amount that is expected to be paid. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, value must be the same as what is used in tir01-007, DocumentCurrencyCode.

Element.Name: Order line - Linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Order line note - Note alla linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Riporta informazioni in testo libero (non strutturate) che, perciò, non sono elaborabili con sistemi automatizzati.

Element.Name: Line item - Elementi della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Contiene gli elementi della linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Line item identifier - Identificativo della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Indica il numero della linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Ordered quantity - Quantità
Element.Description: Indica la quantità di beni o di servizi della linea d’ordine.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure - Unità di misura della quantità
Attribute.Description: Unità di misura della quantità ordinata

Element.Name: Order line amount - Importo della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Indica l’importo della linea d’ordine, comprensivo di sconti e maggiorazioni, al netto dell’IVA.

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta.

Element.Name: Partial delivery indicator - Indicatore di consegna parziale
Element.Description: Indica se la consegna dei beni e/o la prestazione dei servizi deve essere eseguita in unica soluzione (“false”) può svolgersi in più parti (“true”).

Element.Name: Buyers accounting string - Classificazione contabile della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Indica la classificazione contabile del costo riferita all’importo della linea d’ordine nel sistema contabile del Cliente.

Element.Name: Line delivery information - Informazioni consegna della linea d'ordine
Element.Description: Informazioni consegna della linea d'ordine

Element.Name: Delivery location ID
Element.Description: An identifer for the location to where the ordered line item should be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Deliver to location identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Deliver to location identifier.

Element.Name: Order line requested delivery period - Periodo di esecuzione della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Contiene le informazioni relative a quando devono essere consegnati i beni e/o prestati i servizi indicati nella linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Period start date - Data di inizio
Element.Description: Indica la data in cui deve avere inizio la fornitura, nel formato aaaa-mm-gg.

Element.Name: Period end date - Data di fine
Element.Description: Indica la data entro cui deve terminare la fornitura, nel formato aaaa-mm-gg.

Element.Name: Originator information - Richiedente della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Riporta le informazioni relative al soggetto che ha richiesto la linea d’ordine, se diverso dal Cliente.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: Identification of the originator

Element.Name: Order line originator party ID - Identificativo del richiedente della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Indica il codice identificativo del soggetto che ha richiesto la linea d’ordine.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Indica lo scheme identifier dell'identificativo del soggetto che ha richiesto la linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Party name - Nome della parte
Element.Description: Denominazione del richiedente della linea d’ordine

Element.Name: Order line originator party name - Denominazione del richiedente della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Indica la denominazione del soggetto che ha richiesto la linea d’ordine.

Element.Name: Order line allowance and charges - Sconti e Maggiorazioni della linea d’ordine
Element.Description: Contiene l’indicazione degli sconti e delle maggiorazioni applicate a livello di linea d’ordine.
Indica se si sta applicando uno sconto (“false”) o una maggiorazione (“true”).

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge reason code - Identificativo del tipo di sconto o maggiorazione
Element.Description: Indica il codice identificativo associato al tipo di sconto o maggiorazionen

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge reason - Tipo di sconto o di maggiorazione
Element.Description: Riporta in testo libero il tipo di sconto o maggiorazione.

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge percentage - Percentuale di sconto o maggiorazione
Element.Description: Indica la percentuale applicata per calcolare lo sconto o la maggiorazione.

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge amount - Ammontare dello sconto o della maggiorazione
Element.Description: Indica l’importo dello sconto o della maggiorazione.

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta

Element.Name: Line level allowance or charge base amount - Base di calcolo dello sconto o della maggiorazione
Element.Description: Indica l’importo su cui è applicato lo sconto o la maggiorazione.

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta

Element.Name: Price information - Prezzo del bene o del servizio
Item price - Prezzo al netto dell’IVA
Element.Description: Indica il prezzo unitario del bene o del servizio, comprensivo di sconti e maggiorazioni, al netto dell’IVA.

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta.

Element.Name: Item price base quantity - Quantità base
Element.Description: Indica la quantità di beni e/o servizi sulla quale si applica il prezzo unitario.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure - Unità di misura della quantità base
Attribute.Description: Unità di misura della quantità base.

Element.Name: Price discount information - Informazioni sconto/maggiorazione
Element.Description: Informazioni sconto/maggiorazione

Element.Name: AllowanceChargeIndicator - Indicatore sconto/maggiorazione
Element.Description: Indica che si sta applicando uno sconto (valore fisso “false”), in quanto a livello di prezzo si può applicare solo lo sconto.

Element.Name: Discount amount - Ammontare dello sconto
Element.Description: Indica l’importo dello sconto.

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta

Element.Name: Item list price -Prezzo base
Element.Description: Indica il prezzo del bene prima di applicare lo sconto (prezzo di listino).

Attribute.Description: Identificativo valuta.

Element.Name: Item description - Descrizione del bene/servizio
Element.Description: Riporta in testo libero la descrizione estesa del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Item name - Denominazione del bene/servizio
Element.Description: Riporta in testo libero la denominazione del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Buyers item identification - Identificativo prodotto attribuito dal Cliente
Buyers item identifier - Identificativo prodotto attribuito dal Cliente
Element.Description: Indica l’identificativo del bene o del servizio assegnato dal Cliente.

Element.Name: Sellers item identification - Identificativo prodotto attribuito dal Fornitore
The Sellers item identifier - Identificativo prodotto attribuito dal Fornitore
Element.Description: Indica l’identificativo del bene o del servizio assegnato dal Fornitore.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier - Identificativo standard bene/servizio
Element.Description: Indica l’identificativo del bene o del servizio assegnato da un sistema di identificazione univoca.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier - Scheme identifier dell'identificativo standard
Attribute.Description: Indica lo scheme identifier dell'identificativo standard del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Item specification reference - Altri riferimenti
Element.Description: Indica i riferimenti a ulteriori documenti che descrivono il bene o il servizio e a codifiche, come il CIG, il CUP, il DDT, l’Impegno di spesa ecc.

Element.Name: Document reference identifier - Altri riferimenti ID
Element.Description: Identificativo altri riferimenti.

Element.Name: Item classification code - Codice classificazione prodotto
Element.Description: Indica uno o più codici di classificazione del bene o del servizio, tratti, rispettivamente, da uno o più sistemi di classificazione.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier - Scheme identifier dell'identificativo classificazione del prodotto
Attribute.Description: Indica lo scheme identifier dell'identificativo classificazione del bene o del servizio.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier - Versione dello scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Versione dello scheme identifier.

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code - Descrizione classificazione prodotto
Attribute.Description: Descrizione del valore della classificazione del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Item TAX category code - Identificativo della natura dell’imposta
Element.Description: Indica la natura dell’IVA applicata alla cessione del bene o alla prestazione del servizio.

Element.Name: Line TAX rate - Aliquota d’imposta applicata
Element.Description: Indica l’aliquota IVA applicata alla cessione del bene o alla prestazione del servizio.

Element.Name: Tax scheme information - Tipo di imposta applicata

Element.Description: Elemento obbligatorio (ad esempio "VAT" o "GST")

Element.Name: Additional item property information - Ulteriori proprietà
Element.Description: Contiene l’indicazione di ulteriori caratteristiche del bene o del servizio, come numero di sotto-unità contenute in un confezionamento secondario (ad esempio, quante scatole in un imballaggio) o il numero di articoli contenuti in un confezionamento primario (ad esempio, quante siringhe in una confezione).

Element.Name: Item property name - Denominazione della proprietà
Element.Description: Indica la denominazione della caratteristica del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Item property code - Codifica della proprietà
Element.Description: Indica l’eventuale codice assegnato alla caratteristica del bene o del servizio.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id. - Identificativo della lista di codifiche
Attribute.Description: Identificativo della lista di codifiche usata per la proprietà, concordato bilateralmente.

Element.Name: Item property value - Valore della proprietà
Element.Description: Indica il valore della caratteristica del bene o del servizio.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure - Quantificazione della caratteristica
Element.Description: Quantificazione della caratteristica.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure - Codifica dell'unità di misura
Attribute.Description: Codifica dell'unità di misura in cui è espressa la quantificazione.

Element.Name: Property classification - Classificazione della proprietà
Element.Description: Indica l’eventuale classificazione della caratteristica.

Element.Name: Item instance information - Specificazioni del bene
Element.Description: Contiene l’indicazione di dati specifici del bene.

Element.Name: Item serial identification - Numero di serie
Element.Description: Indica il numero di serie del bene.

Element.Name: Item lot information - Informazioni sul lotto
Element.Description: Informazioni sul lotto.

Element.Name: Item lot identifier - Numero del lotto
Element.Description: Indica il numero di lotto del bene.
